newsitem.title: THAILAND: Dynamic to issue 100 mln new shares.
newsitem.headline: Dynamic to issue 100 mln new shares.

text.p: Dynamic Eastern Finance Thailand (1991) Plc said on Thursday it will raise capital by one billion baht ($38.46 million) to 2.78 billion by issuing 100 million new shares at 10 baht each.
The finance and brokerage firm's move is in compliance with the Bank of Thailand's order earlier this month for it to increase capital.

Of the new shares, 50 million will be sold to the central bank's fund for Rehabilitation and Development of Financial Institutions at par 10 baht, Dynamic Eastern said in a filing to the Stock Exchange of Thailand.
The allocation of the remaining 50 million shares will be considered by the company's board later, it said.

Dynamic Eastern was one of 10 finance companies named by the central bank as facing short-term liquidity problems. The central bank said the 10 firms needed to raise capital by a combined 8.25 billion baht.
